description: This file is an entry server script for a Remix framework project, managing server-side rendering and HTTP response handling including bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, distinguishes between OPTIONS, bot, and browser requests, and delegates to specific handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streams HTML response, manages rendering errors.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streams HTML response, manages rendering errors.
